metadata.title: CVE-2019-10785 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: dojox is vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting in all versions before version 1.16.1, 1.15.2, 1.14.5, 1.13.6, 1.12.7 and 1.11.9. This is due to dojox.xmpp.util.xmlEncode only encoding the first occurrence of each character, not all of them.

criterions.comment: dojo package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
